articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian President
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, as regards the terrorist bombing attack on the metro of Sankt-Peterburg City that claimed heavy casualties.
					 The message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the Russian president, and through him, to the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 It sincerely hoped that the sorrow of the bereaved families would be overcome and stability would settle there as early as possible.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Senegal
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Senegal
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Macky Sall, president of Senegal, on the 57th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Senegalese president good health and happiness and the Senegalese people progress and prosperity, expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger.

articles.title: Minju Joson Castigates Japanese Authorities for Implanting Distorted View on History into Minds of Younger Generation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Castigates Japanese Authorities for Implanting Distorted View on History into Minds of Younger Generation
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan opened to public the results of screening of textbooks for high schools. According to it, the Japanese authorities inserted into 80 percent of textbooks of social subjects for second year students of high schools to be used from early next year the contents that Tok Islets are part of the "territory of Japan" and they were illegally occupied by others.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary brings to light the reason why the Japanese authorities are inserting such sheer lies into history textbooks.
					
					 Japan has long pursued the ambition for militarist overseas expansion and Korea is the primary target of overseas aggression and Tok Islets are like the gateway to invading Korea. Hence, the Japanese reactionaries are working so hard to grab the islets in a bid to create favorable conditions for overseas aggression. Obsessed with the ambition for staging a comeback to Korea, the Japanese reactionaries are keen to imbue the younger generation with the distorted view on history and use them as a shock brigade for overseas aggression which their ancestors failed to realize. 
					
					 The younger generation should be educated in such a way as to know truth of history only and establish a right outlook on the world. It is, therefore, a crime to implant into their minds the view on history peppered with lies, distortions and reactionary ideas, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Such criminal moves would only becloud the future of Japan and make the young Japanese fall victim to war of aggression.
					
					 The day will surely come when the young Japanese will curse the authorities for driving them into crimes after becoming mentally crippled and victims of war of aggression because of the wrong idea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Group's "Report on Security" Foolish Scenario for Self-Destruction
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Group's "Report on Security" Foolish Scenario for Self-Destruction
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hwang Kyo An, acting "president" of south Korea, ministers of the puppet administration and riff-raffs called experts on diplomacy and security gathered in Seoul recently to hold what they called a "people's meeting".
					 At the gathering the puppet forces made public a "report on security" at which they claimed that "the worst security crisis is being created due to the north's modernization of nuclear weapons and missiles at a high level." They were so ridiculous as to vociferate about countermeasures against it.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms it as a product of their cynical ploy to justify the moves for invading the north and doing harm to the fellow countrymen in the north by force of arms in league with foreign forces while making much fuss about the "security crisis".
					
					 The "report on security" is, indeed, an anachronistic scenario for confrontation, a foolish one for self-destruction as it is peppered with odds and ends without any feasibility, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "report" much touted by the puppet forces is nothing but fig-leaf to cover up their military inferiority and vulnerability, taken aback by the tremendous military muscle of the DPRK.
					
					 No one can be browbeaten by the nonsensical "report" full of contradictions.
					
					 The puppet forces' release of the above-said report is no more than the last resort of those finding themselves in the bottomless abyss of ruin to prolong their remaining days.
					
					 Those who do not know what a real war is like run amuck, peddling the "report". It is as foolish as trying to get the sun eclipsed by palms. 
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that such ruckus over "security crisis" would only precipitate their final ruin.

articles.title: Minju Joson Snipes at Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group for Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
Minju Joson Snipes at Remnants of Park Geun Hye Group for Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The remnants of the  south Korean conservative group of Park Geun Hye are ridiculously claiming that the new bill for anti-DPRK sanctions introduced by the U.S. recently is "very productive and effective" and  "it will contribute to strengthening sanctions enforcement system" and the "government" would keep step with them.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What the puppet forces are doing is nothing but a foolish act to save the confrontation policy from its total bankruptcy by depending on the U.S. master. 
					
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea are becoming vocal calling for improving the inter-Korean relations and resuming north-south cooperation undertakings such as the Kaesong Industrial Park and Tour of Mt Kumgang which were suspended by the conservative group and the movement for opening the pan-national conference this year without fail is getting brisk after Park Geun Hye was ousted from power.
					
					 However, puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se challenged this trend of the times by crying out for "closer alliance" for aggression with foreign forces and "cooperation in enforcing sanctions." This is no more than a desperate fit of a psychopath to get rid of his abyss of ruin.
					
					 Such human scum as Yun steeped in inveterate confrontation, sycophancy and treachery to the marrow of their bones and other betes noires are only fated to be thrown into the dumping group of history along with Park.

articles.title: Desire of South Koreans for New Politics and New Life Can Never Be Quelled: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Desire of South Koreans for New Politics and New Life Can Never Be Quelled: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang April 4 (KCNA) -- The people from all walks of life in south Korea are becoming vocal calling for an early end to the reactionary and conservative politics and new progressive politics after the impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It was quite natural that the south Korean people spat at the conservative group and turned their back on them for having pursued corrupt and treacherous politics. This was an eruption of their resentment as they have undergone all sorts of misfortune and sufferings, being treated as dogs and pigs by the puppet ruling quarters for four years of Park Geun Hye's office, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Justice and democracy the south Korean people have desired so much would not come true and they would not be able to lead an independent life without a positive struggle to make a clean sweep of the roots and leftovers of the old and corrupt conservative politics of the puppet group.
					
					 The puppet conservative group is a bandit of thrice-cursed traitors as they have brought unbearable national disgrace to the south Korean people.
					
					 The people are bound to be disgraced if the traitors keen on sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces run wild.
					
					 The puppet conservative group cannot abandon their bad habit till they die as they are hell-bent on fascist dictatorship and irregularities and corruption.
					
					 The south Korean people cannot pardon the conservative group for deceiving them and clinging to the moves to stay in power.
					
					 No one can quell the desire and wishes of the south Korean people to put an end to the treacherous politics of the conservative group and realize new politics and a new life.
					
					 No matter how desperately the conservative group may work while blocking the advance of history to prolong their remaining days though they had been sentenced to death by the public, they can never escape their doom.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Come out with New Way of Thinking and New Strategy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Come out with New Way of Thinking and New Strategy
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. House of Representatives is mulling passing a "bill on escalating sanctions with respect to transactions relating to North Korea".
					 The bill the keynote of which is to seek the sinister intention of totally excluding the DPRK from the international financial system is nothing new as it is part of a series of the U.S. persistent moves for stifling it through sanctions.
					
					 However, the U.S. is making much fuss, advertising it as if it were of significance. This is nothing but a ridiculous farce staged by those who are frightened by the daily increasing political and military might of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. modified and supplemented the "North Korea Sanctions and Policy Enhancement Act of 2016" of the Obama administration which admitted a total failure in its DPRK policy. This fact reveals that the U.S. is resorting to the last expedient.
					
					 No matter how hard the U.S. may beat the worn-out drum for sanctions, it cannot sound properly.
					
					 The U.S. "doctrine of sanctions being all-powerful" has already gone totally bust in this land and the "doctrine of useless sanctions" against the DPRK is heard even among the hostile forces. 
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than the U.S. scenario to put under control the political and military might of the full-fledged nuclear weapons state through the bankrupt "racket for escalating sanctions." 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces cooked up the "sanctions resolution" in March last year, blustering that the unprecedentedly harsh sanctions would force the DPRK to bend its knees within six months. But they had better recall what terrible miscalculation it was.
					
					 Within their "timetable" the DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of ground-to-ground medium to long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, test-fire of SLBM (submarine-launched ballistic missile), the ground jet test of a new type high-thrust engine of a carrier rocket for the geo-stationary satellite and explosion test of nuclear warhead to startle the world and demonstrate the might of the nuclear power all over the world.
					
					 It is needless to prove that escalating sanctions against the DPRK is in direct proportion to the DPRK's bolstering of its national power.
					
					 The DPRK is able to prosper in the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development despite any sanctions and pressure as long as there are its territory, the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government, water and air in this land. It is the faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Sanctions will never work on the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. does not need any "new bill" but a new way of thinking and a new strategy.

articles.title: KCTU Declares General Strike
articles.content:
KCTU Declares General Strike
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held rallies in Seoul and 10 other parts of south Korea on March 29 all at once to declare a general strike for building a new society where working masses become master and equal society, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The KCTU stated it would launch a social general strike on June 30 for the lowest wage increase, abolition of part-time job, dismissal of plutocrat-system and total amendment of the "labor law".
					
					 A resolution was read out.
					
					 The resolution stressed that the organization would bring spring without Park Geun Hye, new people's spring by meeting the requirements of the workers and the mindset of the candlelight action.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Helicopter Strafing Threatens Lives of Local Civilians
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Helicopter Strafing Threatens Lives of Local Civilians
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A U.S. helicopter in the firing range of the U.S. aggression forces in Phochon City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on April 1 strafed a stock-farm around it , according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Two south Korean residents working near the stock farm were seriously threatened by the strafing.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Colombo on March 22.
					 The chairman of the Gampaha Branch of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as seminar and meeting praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on March 27.
					 L. A. Kobuizov, first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from March 27 to April 17 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita el 57o aniversario de la independencia de Senegal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita el 57o aniversario de la independencia de Senegal
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Senegal, Macky Sall, con motivo del 57o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran aun mas en el futuro, el remitente deseo de todo corazon la buena salud y felicidad del destinatario y el progreso y prosperidad del pueblo senegales.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intento de autoridades japonesas de tergiversar la historia
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intento de autoridades japonesas de tergiversar la historia
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon publico el resultado de examen de los manuales para las escuelas superiores. Segun ello, las autoridades japonesas incluyeron en el 80% de los manuales de asignaturas sociales del segundo grado de la escuela superior, que entraran en uso desde principios del ano proximo, el parrafo de que el islote Tok es "territorio japones ocupado ilegalmente" por otro pais.
					Para revelar la intencion de las autoridades japonesas que anotan esa mentira pura en los manuales de historia, el periodico Minju Joson publico hoy un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Para Japon que abrigo largo tiempo la ambicion militarista de expansionismo a ultramar, Corea es el primer blanco y el islote Tok es la primera puerta para agredirla. Por eso, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan arrebatar por la fuerza ese islote, reconocido historicamente como tierra coreana, y preparar condiciones favorables para la agresion. Para ello, quieren inyectar en las generaciones venideras la tergiversada concepcion de historia y lanzarlas como brigada de choque a la agresion a ultramar, obra inconclusa de sus antepasados.
					
					En lugar de ayudar a las nuevas generaciones a conocer la verdad de la historia y tener correcta concepcion del mundo, ellos les inculcan la concepcion de historia llena de fraudes, mentiras y pensamientos reaccionarios.
					
					Este crimen entenebrece el futuro de Japon y convertira a los jovenes y ninos japoneses en las victimas de la guerra de agresion.
					
					Vendra sin falta el dia en que los jovenes y ninos convertidos en invalidos espirituales debido a la mala ideologia maldigan a las autoridades japoneses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica el "informe de seguridad" publicado en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica el "informe de seguridad" publicado en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, tuvo lugar en Seul el llamado "acto de informe del pueblo" con la participacion del "presidente" interino Hwang Kyo An, los ministros y los especialistas de asuntos diplomaticos y de seguridad. 
					En el "informe de seguridad" publicado en esa ocasion, los titeres surcoreanos insistieron en que "se crea la peor crisis de seguridad debido al desarrollo en alto nivel de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea" y enumeraron las contramedidas. 
					
					En un comentario individual de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de producto del complot para justificar las maniobras de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de crear la "crisis de seguridad" y derrumbarla luego por via militar en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, y continua:
					
					El "informe de seguridad" es el anacronico guion suicida y conflictivo que recoge iniciativas de imposible cumplimiento. 
					
					Ese documento no pasa de ser un papel mojado para ocultar la inferioridad militar y la vulnerabilidad de los titeres surcoreanos atemorizados ante el inagotable poderio militar de la RPDC. 
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que su campana fratricida justificada con el embuste sobre la "crisis de seguridad" les adelantara el arruinamiento definitivo.

articles.title: ACNC comenta accion de EE.UU. para recrudecer la sancion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta accion de EE.UU. para recrudecer la sancion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de abril (ACNC) -- La Camara de Representantes del Congreso estadounidense planea aprobar el "proyecto de ley para la intensificacion de sancion sobre las transacciones con el Norte de Corea" con el objetivo principal de excluir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del sistema financiero internacional. 
					Este procedimiento legislativo no es nada nuevo porque forma parte de la rutinaria campana de EE.UU. para sancionar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					En otro sentido, constituye una accion estupida de los atemorizados ante el creciente poderio politico y militar del pais socialista.
					
					El polemico "proyecto de ley" es la version enmendada de la "ley de intensificacion de sancion y politica sobre el Norte de Corea de 2016" de la administracion Obama que reconocio el fracaso total de su politica sobre la RPDC. Este hecho demuestra que EE.UU. orquesto la farsa de aprobacion del "proyecto de ley" porque ya no le queda otro remedio.
					
					Ya resulto fracasada totalmente en el territorio coreano la "doctrina de omnipotencia de sancion" y se presenta hasta en el campo de las fuerzas hostiles la "teoria de inutilidad de sancion" anticoreana. 
					
					Es una ilusion vana el intento de frenar el crecimiento del prestigio politico y militar del pais poseedor de armas nucleares mediante el "recrudecimiento de sancion". 
					
					En marzo del ano pasado cuando fabricaron nueva "resolucion de sancion", los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus seguidores prometieron con fanfarroneria que la RPDC se arrodillaria dentro de 6 meses ante la sancion sin precedentes. 
					
					Pero, en ese "tiempo limite", la RPDC realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de alcance intermedio Hwasong-10, el otro del cohete balistico en el submarino estrategico, la prueba estatica de la reaccion del motor de gran capacidad para el nuevo tipo de cohete transportador de satelite estacionario y la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear. Estos exitos sorprendieron a todo el mundo demostrando el poderio de la potencia nuclear. 
					
					Se ha comprobado que el endurecimiento de sancion anti-RPDC produce el resultado contrario que es el fortalecimiento del poderio estatal de ella. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen la firme conviccion de que pueden frustrar todas formas de sancion y presion y lograr la prosperidad con el poderio de autofortalecimiento si tienen el territorio, el partido, el gobierno de la RPDC y el agua y aire. 
					
					La sancion es infructifera en el caso de la RPDC. 
					
					Lo que hace falta a EE.UU. no es un "nuevo proyecto de ley" sino nuevo modo de pensar y nueva estrategia.
